title: Missing Woman Found
body:
UPDATE August 10, 2018: Ms. Reeves-Williams was safely located.Sharon Reeves-WilliamsThe Prince George’s County Police Department is seeking the public’s assistance in searching for a missing person. She is identified as 52-year-old Sharon Reeves-Williams. Reeves-Williams was last seen earlier in July in the 6700 block of 94Avenue in Lanham. Reeves-Williams is described as a black female, 5’4”, and 160 pounds. Reeves-Williams was last seen wearing a black scarf on her head, blue jeans and white shoes.Anyone with information on her whereabouts is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Regional Investigation Division – Southern Region at (301) 772-4911.
